text: The Love Island USA Season 7 Episode 3 release date and time is right around the corner. The new season is set in a villa in Fiji, focusing on a new group of sexy singles. These contestants will compete to win the ultimate cash prize of $100,000. Here’s everything you need to know about when Love Island USA Season 7’s third episode airs and where to watch it. When is the Love Island USA Season 7 Episode 3 release date & time? The episode’s release date is June 5, 2025, and its release time is 6 p.m. PT and 9 p.m. ET. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeJune 5, 20259 p.mPacific TimeJune 5, 20256 p.m Where to watch Love Island USA Season 7 Episode 3 You can watch Love Island USA Season 7 Episode 3 via Peacock. Peacock is a streaming service launched by NBCUniversal, named after its Peacock logo. It offers a diverse array of content, including popular NBCUniversal series such as The Office, Parks and Recreation, and Brooklyn Nine-Nine, as well as original programming like Poker Face, Bel-Air, and Dr. Death. Fans can stream all the episodes of Love Island USA Season 7 on the platform after purchasing its subscription. What is Love Island USA about? The reality show focuses on a group of contestants competing to find love and win the prize money on an island. The official synopsis for Love Island USA is as follows: “American version of the British dating reality competition in which ten singles come to stay in a villa for a few weeks and have to couple up with one another. Over the course of those weeks, they face the public vote and might be eliminated from the show. Other islanders join and try to break up the couples.”
html:
The Love Island USA Season 7 Episode 3 release date and time is right around the corner. The new season is set in a villa in Fiji, focusing on a new group of sexy singles. These contestants will compete to win the ultimate cash prize of $100,000.

Here’s everything you need to know about when Love Island USA Season 7’s third episode airs and where to watch it.

When is the Love Island USA Season 7 Episode 3 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is June 5, 2025, and its release time is 6 p.m. PT and 9 p.m. ET.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Where to watch Love Island USA Season 7 Episode 3

You can watch Love Island USA Season 7 Episode 3 via Peacock.

Peacock is a streaming service launched by NBCUniversal, named after its Peacock logo. It offers a diverse array of content, including popular NBCUniversal series such as The Office, Parks and Recreation, and Brooklyn Nine-Nine, as well as original programming like Poker Face, Bel-Air, and Dr. Death. Fans can stream all the episodes of Love Island USA Season 7 on the platform after purchasing its subscription.

What is Love Island USA about?

The reality show focuses on a group of contestants competing to find love and win the prize money on an island.

The official synopsis for Love Island USA is as follows:

“American version of the British dating reality competition in which ten singles come to stay in a villa for a few weeks and have to couple up with one another. Over the course of those weeks, they face the public vote and might be eliminated from the show. Other islanders join and try to break up the couples.”
